 I've solved my initial problem with the column header (the content aligment), but I have a new one, I noticed that the little arrow that shows the sort direction does not show anymore.
 Here is my column header style:

<Style TargetType="toolkit:DataGridColumnHeader" BasedOn="{StaticResource {x:Type toolkit:DataGridColumnHeader}}">
        <Setter Property="Background" Value="{StaticResource LightBrush}" />

        <Setter Property="Padding" Value="5,0,5,0" />

            </Trigger>
            <Trigger Property="IsPressed" Value="true">
                <Setter Property="Background" Value="{StaticResource PressedBrush}"/>
                <Setter Property="Margin" Value="1,1,0,0"/>
            </Trigger>
            <Trigger Property="IsEnabled" Value="false">
                <Setter Property="Foreground"
                      Value="{DynamicResource {x:Static SystemColors.GrayTextBrushKey}}"/>
            </Trigger>
        </Style.Triggers>
    </Style>
 
Any ideas why is the arrow not showing ?
